pr_title: [GEOS-9758] CRS Panel overrides URN SRS format with EPSG:XXXX format

timeline.message:
[GEOS-9758] CRS Panel overrides URN SRS format with EPSG:XXXX format

- updated CRS panel class with new flag and constructor
- flag will bind the text field to SRS literals known to CRSPanel only
- updated existing unit test

timeline.bodyText: Can you actually check the values? "urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4326" shows in the comments, but it's not actually verified.
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.message:
[GEOS-9758] AA requested changes 1

- Fixed unit tests
